title: Activity Plan
description: Information about a series of planned activities.

WellboreID.title: Wellbore ID
WellboreID.description: A reference to the wellbore that is the subject of this activity plan

WellPlanningActivities.title: WellPlanningActivities
WellPlanningActivities.description: The activities that compose this plan

items.title: Well Planning Activity
items.description: Information regarding an individual activity that is part of the ActivityPlan

Name.title: Name
Name.description: A name given to this activity

DepthRange.title: Depth Range
DepthRange.description: The depth range over which the the activity takes place

HoleDepthStart.title: Hole Depth Start
HoleDepthStart.description: The depth of the hole at the start of the activity. Depth relative to Planned wellbore ZDP. Navigate via WellboreID to the side-car WellPlanningWellbore, which holds the depth reference in data.VerticalMeasurement.

HoleDepthEnd.title: Hole Depth End
HoleDepthEnd.description: The depth of the hole at the end of the activity. Depth relative to Planned wellbore ZDP. Navigate via WellboreID to the side-car WellPlanningWellbore, which holds the depth reference in data.VerticalMeasurement.

ActivityDepthStart.title: Activity Depth Start
ActivityDepthStart.description: The start depth of the activity. Depth relative to Planned wellbore ZDP. Navigate via WellboreID to the side-car WellPlanningWellbore, which holds the depth reference in data.VerticalMeasurement.

ActivityDepthEnd.title: Activity Depth End
ActivityDepthEnd.description: The end depth of the activity. Depth relative to Planned wellbore ZDP. Navigate via WellboreID to the side-car WellPlanningWellbore, which holds the depth reference in data.VerticalMeasurement.

ParentID.title: Parent ID
ParentID.description: The parent activity to this activity

ActivityCodeID.title: Activity Code
ActivityCodeID.description: The activity code of the activity

PredecessorsID.title: Predecessors ID
PredecessorsID.description: The preceding activity in the plan

ProductiveTimeDuration.title: Productive Time Duration
ProductiveTimeDuration.description: The expected productive time of the activity - if "clean time probability" distribution is populated then this should be the expected value of the distribution

NonProductiveTimeDuration.title: Non Productive Time Duration
NonProductiveTimeDuration.description: The expected duration of the non productive time of the activity

ProductiveTimeStatistics.title: Productive Time Statistics
ProductiveTimeStatistics.description: Statistics that define the expected productivity time of this activity

items.title: Statistics
items.description: Structure that describes a individual statistic record of the operations from an activity.

ProbabilityTypeID.title: Probability Type Identifier
ProbabilityTypeID.description: Identifier of the probability type the value is describing

NonProductiveTimeStatistics.title: Non Productive Time Statistics
NonProductiveTimeStatistics.description: Statistics that define the non productive time of this activity

items.title: Statistics
items.description: Structure that describes a individual statistic record of the operations from an activity.

ProbabilityTypeID.title: Probability Type Identifier
ProbabilityTypeID.description: Identifier of the probability type the value is describing

RateOfPenetrationStatistics.title: Rate Of Penetration Statistics
RateOfPenetrationStatistics.description: Statistics that define the rate of penetration of this activity

items.title: ROP Statistics
items.description: Individual Statistics that define the rate of penetration of an activity

ProbabilityTypeID.title: Probability Type Identifier
ProbabilityTypeID.description: Identifier of the probability type the value is describing

Comment.title: Comment
Comment.description: Free form comments associated with this activity

ObjectReferenceIDs.title: Object Reference IDs
ObjectReferenceIDs.description: Reference to objects that is defined within the context of a wellbore. The WITSML 1.4.1 standard has only one object reference, but a risk may related with multiple objects.

ActivityCodeCatalogVersion.title: Catalog Version
ActivityCodeCatalogVersion.description: the catalog version of this activity

ActivityLevel.title: Activity Level
ActivityLevel.description: The activity level of this activity. Levels go from L1 to L6

PlannedStartTime.title: Planned Start Time
PlannedStartTime.description: Date/Time the activity is planned to start

PlannedEndTime.title: Planned End Time
PlannedEndTime.description: Date/Time the activity is planned to end

PlannedDuration.title: Planned Duration
PlannedDuration.description: Overall duration as planned for the activity

RiskIDs.title: Risk IDs
RiskIDs.description: A reference to the object that holds the information about the risks that apply to the activity

IsOptional.title: Is Optional
IsOptional.description: Flag used to indicates this particular activity is optional in the plan.
